title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, September 30, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of W. S. Merwin (1927), whose poetry was called  “luminous, often tender poems that focus on the profound power of memory” by the Pulitzer Prize Committee.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
